page.title: 10The Bacchus Hotel.
page.content: The main hotel in Sutton is the Bacchus.The manager is{Mr D.Holly. {Mr Holly}spent his childhood in Wales and has only lived here for 5 years.In the summer about 25-30 people stay at the hotel.He provides snooker,darts and a juke box.On Sundays they have an organist,dancing or a brass band.{Mr {Holly}has worked in a hotel in Gloucester and two in Surrey.{Mr Holly goes out shopping in his spare time and he also paints.He expects a lot more people will come to the Bacchus now he has built a new extension.He has 11 full time staff.He does not get many complaints and he says the Bacchus is the best hotel he has been in because it is seasonal.The Bacchus is over 400 years old.It used to be called "The Jolly Bacchus".It was named after the Greek god of wine.
